item.title: The US stories everyone was talking about in 2024
item.description: This year was full of first-of-its-kind stories that got Americans talking.

item.title: Dead body discovered in airplane wheel well on Christmas Eve
item.description: United Airlines Flight 202 arrived at the Kahului Airport in Maui from Chicago O'Hare International Airport on Dec. 24.
